title: No more chat restriction, instant bans

embed.description: LEAGUE OF SALT! When the League Community is TILTING / Raging We all flame, tilt & ragie, but did you ever saw Pro Players & Streamers tilting?

body:
So, in this video so many streamers and pros rage harder in chat than i ever have, this one guy repeatedly saying "get cancer and die" and i bet nothing happens.

I get 2 week banned on smurfs for telling someone to shut the fuck up when they start talking shit. Are you serious riot? Nice way to kill your game.

replies.body: Then why get mad if its not your fault?

> [{quoted}](name=Tmo,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=zZ%%%%f8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-30T23:45:52.678+0000)
>
> Then why get mad if its not your fault?


how can I not get mad? they're wasting my time and ruining my game, how am I meant o have fun when people are spaming "ff15" or "gg we cantr win" at 6minutes because they have died twice?

I am getting trolled more games than im not its past a joke now what am I meant to do? get trolled, lose, report them and move on for it to then happen again and again and again?

Game 1

mmm Popsicles: can you come leash sorry whole computer froze
mmm Popsicles: ty for not remaking

mmm Popsicles: SERIOUSLY

Game 3

all 3 games being trolled sworn at in chinese etc etc etc but I can get perm banned for this? its a fucking joke the game with rammus talk I was last pick the support was trolling for auto fill banned the adc's vayne and starts swearing at him I go teemo jg not even trolling go look at the OP.GG i did fine yet im perm banned? this system makes no fucking sense

> [{quoted}](name=mmm Popsicles,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=zZ%%%%f8,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-10-30T14:29:17.107+0000)

The secret to Flaming the Chinese is to do so in a language they understand, but Riot doesnt
I forgot to mention that  the rammus took my hovered champion after I said I was reporting him for trolling everyone, then followed me for 7 minutes trying to take my jungle camps

^LUL

im sure in hindsite you can say what you what but in reality you wernt in these games and didnt have to deal with the sona ulting your camps, flashing over walls to steal camps, abusing whole team, swearing in chinese, afk'ing or feeding oh and we havnt even left game 1 yet, as for "toxic from the begining" that is explained were an autofill supp banned the ADC's hovered champion, then when I said i was reporting him after he abused everyone he took my hovered champion and followed me in the jungle trying to take camps for 7 minutes... how can you justify their behaviour and not expect me to be mad when these 3 games where all in arow even after taking breaks between each game im sick of trolls

Yeah but unfortunately Riot doesn't care about context.

The trolls are nearly always in the right.

well i got banned 4 times till now, and i am still playing on my 5th i got banned yesterday my 4th ban but guess what,  i dun care coz i am gona ruin games for every 1 lol by playing more and more and be toxic ;) 

Praise toxic players more than Trolls, :D
